help:
The goal of the game is to guess the current gregtech item correct. Here's a breakdown of all the commands:
- **answer**: Used to submit your guess on what the item is.
- **a**: Shortcut for /answer.
- **score**: Shows the leaderboard on who has the highest score, you can also select specific pages.
- **userscore**: Shows your own score, along with the 5 people ahead of you and 4 people behind. You can also specify a user.
- **skip**: Skips the current image. Requires 10 minutes to have passed, and 3 people to use the command, all of which must have used all 3 guesses. Alternatively, if 30 minutes have passed, a single user can skip, regardless of guess count.
1.1.0:
- Update replaces.json to include substation hatches, 'hex':'16X' is now 'hex_':'16X ' to prevent getting mixed up with any images with hex in their name.
- upper.json how requires spaces after every voltage tier to prevent conflits.
- Fix scoreboard. No longer generates ghost entries with usernames instead of user id's when using the /score command. Numbering is now correct, for example page 2 now starts at 11 instead of 10.
- Added /skip command, requires 3 people that have used all 3 guesses to skip after 10 minutes have passed since the last image.
- Add info command to access changelogs and help.
- Add info subcommands: `1.0.1`, `1.1.0`, `help`.
- Add reduceproblist.txt, so when an image with any keywords in the list are found, it re-rolls.
- quit is now a slash command.
- /image command description now specifies that it is admin-only.
- Added warnings when you have 1 and 0 guesses left.
1.1.1:
- Add version subcommand
- Fix error message when invalid subcommand is used.
1.1.2:
- Update 1.1.0 changelog, now notes guess warnings. It also contains proper capitalization.
- Update reduceproblist to add `refined`, `crushed`, and `pure`.
- Fix skip command to not reset everytime it is used, which made the 10 minute version useless.
- Update replaces.json flowing~ -> flowing_ (oops). Also added aluminum => aluminium
1.1.3:
- Reduce time to /skip to 5 minutes.
- Fix bug where /skip amount would not reset with new images.
- Reduced people required to skip from 3 -> 2.
